join.name: join
join.description: Join the voice channel where you at.

options.name: channel
options.description: (optional) voice channel to use the bot

leave.name: leave
leave.description: Leave from the currently joined voice channel.

locale.name: locale
locale.description: Get or set the locale of the bot on this server. ("Manage Server" permission required to set)

options.name: locale-id
options.description: id of the new locale to set (https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#locales)

say.name: say
say.description: Currently deprecated. Please use Thread-based instead.

generic: Please send this Error ID to developer.
guildOnlyBot: Sorry. I only can be used on the server  :cry:
Maybe you can invite me on your server?
You can check about my information at my profile!  :relaxed:
error.unknownChannel: :grey_question: Unknown channel. Did you entered **Channel ID** correctly?
error.localeAlreadySet: :no_entry_sign: Server locale has already set to specified one.
error.localeInvalid: :grey_question: Unknown or invalid locale ID. Did you entered it correctly?
error.botNoPermission: :hourglass_flowing_sand::no_entry_sign:  I don't have permission(s)(**{0}**) to do this action.
error.userNoPermission: :hourglass_flowing_sand::no_entry_sign:  You don't have permission to do this action!
error.botNotInVC: :loud_sound: :x: I don't joined in any voice channel now.
error.userNotInVC: :loud_sound:  :no_entry_sign: I can't find {0} in any voice channel. Please join voice channel first.
error.textTooLong: :loud_sound:  :page_with_curl: Text too long. Write within {0} letter(s).

info: :scroll: This program is licensed under the GNU General Public License, version 2.

current: **English, US** will be used instead if your language is unsupported. (except for voice)
You can check out for list of supported languages below.
locale.successfullySet: :white_check_mark: Server locale have been changed from {0} to {1}.
